name: wpsass
description: Use Sass with WordPress, Node Script in SCSS flavour.

scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style expanded --include-path scss style.scss style.css && postcss -r style.css
scripts.build:woocommerce-css: node-sass --output-style expanded --include-path scss woocommerce.scss woocommerce.css && postcss -r woocommerce.css

author: Ahmad Awais
